attributes.title: Ew just no 😡💆🏻‍♀️🕺🕺🕺
attributes.review: I don’t even understand why he has a app 🤦‍♀️ anyway so like Chile ig umm, the first thing pop up was Donald Duck 🍊 like holding a fist into the sky and idk he kinda looked fugly right there I mean he always looks hella crusty nvm. So like can we have someone else than Donald Duck 🍊. Can the Mickeys comment on his Twitter or something like I’m tired of this president 😃💅💅💅💅 and the app is just a big mistake 😼🕺🕺💃💃🕺💃🕺💃🕺💃🕺💃🕺

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This is a very very terrible app. You see and I have had a lot of apps in my time. So i know apps. This app is not as good as other apps that I have seen. I see that many apps are very good, but not like this app. This app makes me want a new phone with better apps. Whoever designed this app needs to be fired. It’s a very terrible terrible app.  I hope they learn their lesson. My apologies Donald Stump.

attributes.title: Awful, uses 5G
attributes.review: I don’t usually write reviews but this app is DANGEROUS. When I logged in I noticed in the corner of my phone next to the battery, my 4G symbol changed to 5G, DO NOT BE FOOLED MY FELLOW TRUMP SUPPORTERS, I think the Chinese have invaded this great app and are stealing our information. ONLY when I deleted the app, did the 5G symbol disappear. I’m changing all my passwords... I don’t feel safe anymore.... god be with us and this great nation...

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app is very unpleasantly disturbing I definitely do not recommend this app because it has a lot of boring and unreasonable content on this appEverything about this Donald Trump 2020 app is very disturbing and when I say disturbing I am definitely not exaggerating I hope this app gets shut down because I would not like to see it again anyway everyone have a good day

attributes.title: 🤢no🤢
attributes.review: I 💯 percent do NOT😤 recommend this app🤬!!! I was robbed💶 immediately, and my eyes started to bleed🩸 due to the horrible thing I was witnessing!! Even Satan👹 came! And he then said, “🧚‍♀️💞TruMp 2⭕️2o, BuT MakE iT a GrAVeStOne💞🧚‍♀️” I was in shock! I never agreed with satan once, but this time, I did😱! I decided to give him a high-five👏! So if you decide to get this app, I will cry 😭 for you, and wish you well🤭! 👁👄👁                   Good luck Charlie 😽                 👉👈

attributes.title: SO SCARY
attributes.review: This app is the most horrifying thing ever!! When I first opened the app, the first thing that I saw was a photo of trump in a spray tan machine... NAKED! 😳😳! Disgusting even Melania doesn’t want to see that. The audio playing in the background was Melania saying “HELLO HELLO HELLO” over and over again! Incredibly scary!! Then my wallpaper on my iPhone became a LARGE CHEETO!! 😳 what the !!! So scary! I am begging you all not to get this app it is full of viruses and weird Cheetos !!!

attributes.title: Ew.🟠
attributes.review: So first off I opened the app the see a orange laying on the lake😳 the next thing with shock you! My worm went and tracked his location and was spying on him, he brought back the footage and you will never guess what he saw!!! Orange was in a dress watching Sofia the first singing the intro😧 but that’s not all he was having a tea party with his stuffed Cheeto (not gonna lie I could not tell the difference) my dinosaur was even shocked

attributes.title: Horrible person and app.
attributes.review: Trump thinks he can control gen z when he doesn’t realize we are more powerful than he can EVER contain. He is racist, sexist and homophobic, makes horrible choices for the us and the environment. He treats his son like garbage and when he is clearly depressed. Due to trump we officially have the worst amount of corona cases and it’s STILL rising so it’s time for us to make a stand ANYONE BUT TRUMP 2020!

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I’ll speak in metaphors here. This app is a racist pig’s pen. Impossible to navigate, disgustingly disgusting, ugly, and horribly offensive. This app is a tragic movie directed by elementary students. Starts off horribly and ends horribly too. I don’t suggest downloading this app. It’s horrifying to an unprepared eye. Avoid this app at all times if you value your life. Run. Drop your device and RUN. Why are you still reading? I SAID RUN.

attributes.title: I LOVE TRUMP
attributes.review: Trump is such an amazing person that I wonder how nobody has taken a shot at him yet. Like how? He’s such a good man at doing business that he is getting bullied by 10 year olds. I aspire to be the person who actually cares about the future of their country, like Bernie. Oh did I say I love trump? Haha no I meant that he can go shake his nonexistent hair towards a banana peel and hopefully his intelligent dementia takes over him
